```{r echo=FALSE}
library(magrittr)

card_summary <- params$card_summary
card_summary_file <- params$card_summary_file
```

Addtionally, the pipeline produces a summary table of genes annotated from CARD database since it has a comprehensive catalog of AMR genes.

```{r echo=FALSE, comment="", eval=TRUE}
df <- read.delim(params$card_summary_file, header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
df
```
